alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 6:41PM PST until December 07 at 1:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches above 5000 feet. A trace to 2 inches between 4000 and 5000 feet. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Brief periods of heavy snow will be possible, reducing visibility and producing locally-higher amounts. Main areas of concern include US-95 near Goldfield and highway 266 near Lida Summit.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
